titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain Bureau of Land Management land in Daggett County, Utah, to the State of Utah for public purposes.
Jarvie Ranch Conveyance Act
Jarvie Ranch Conveyance Act
Jarvie Ranch Conveyance Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Jarvie Ranch Conveyance Act
This bill directs the Department of the Interior to convey, without consideration, to the State of Utah a specified 530-acre parcel of Bureau of Land Management land, including improvements, for public purposes.
